metadata.description: "Nota. Il est nécessaire de faire remarquer que ce mémoire doit être rapporté à la date du 20 février, époque à-peu-près de sa composition."

metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Title page is on the cover. Damaged, stained, and/or loose pages. Uneven binding. Skewed text.
